text: Nimwicuza mwembi (Hafsa na Ayisha) kuri Allah (bizaba ari byo byiza kuri mwe) kuko imitima yanyu yateshutse. Ariko nimumuteraniraho (Umuhanuzi, mugamije kumubuza amahoro), mu by’ukuri Allah ni we Murinzi we; azanatabarwa na (Malayika) Jibrilu n’abemeramana bakora ibikorwa byiza ndetse n’abamalayika (bazamutabara)
